name: Ships vs Cops
description:
Steer the ship, fire your gun and catch some tuna. See if you can escape with your boat in Ships vs Cops!

«Not on our watch», they said. Coast guard has never been so wrong before. Ships vs Cops is a challenging action, which lets you feel the most impertinent troublemaker of local waters. Catch the fish, accept challenges and avoid officers of the law!

Something to do in Ships vs Cops:

— Be smart and do extraordinary manoeuvres to escape from the patrol;
— Try more than 20 ships and choose yours;
— Upgrade your ship with your favourite gun: laser, minigun and more;
— Catch all the fish and enjoy your impunity!
